Race.SpecificTitle: Councilmen at Large -- City of Bogalusa
Sales Tax District No. 3 -- 1/3 of 1% S&U Tax Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sales Tax District No. 3 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Sales Tax District No. 3 of the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Section 338.54 of Title 47 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a tax of one-third (1/3) of one percent (1%) as such is currently being levied directly by the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana (the "Tax") (an estimated $1,617,000.00 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), within the District, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services therein, for a period of ten (10) years, commencing January 1, 2024, with the net proceeds of the Tax to be dedicated solely to providing, maintaining, administering and operating services and facilities in the civil, juvenile and criminal justice system mandated by state statute to be funded by parish governments?
